message:
SYSTEM: RicoMayo2018.pdf: Página 19
Future work
• To create a user interface to assist annotators
• We have got a Google Summer of Code project
• Web app
• Balance high probably wrong
mappings versus low number
of mapping instances
• Several experts should evaluate
the same mappings to achieve a
common agreement about
correct/incorrect mappings
• Deal with highly unbalanced
mappings (e.g. few incorrect).
speaker: SYSTEM
